meanings.sent1: The skiers glided gracefully down the snowy slope.
meanings.sent2: Many skiers enjoy the thrill of racing down the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The skiers looked like they were dancing on the snow.
meanings.sent4: The group of skiers painted a colorful picture against the white backdrop.
meanings.sent5: The skiers left a trail of tracks behind them as they descended.

meanings.definition: Those who participate in the sport of skiing.
meanings.sent1: The skiers gathered at the lodge after a day on the slopes.
meanings.sent2: The ski resort was bustling with skiers of all ages.
meanings.sent3: The skiers joked about their wipeouts over hot cocoa.
meanings.sent4: The skiers conquered the mountain like fearless warriors.
meanings.sent5: The cheers of the skiers echoed through the valley.
